an3.113:4.3: Yo ca abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño, yo ca suddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantaṃ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṃseti, yo cāyaṃ evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi:
an3.113:4.4: ‘natthi kāmesu doso’ti, so tāya kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati.
an3.113:4.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāyā”ti.
